page.title: 04CORNBURY PARK RACING STUD
page.content: The Cornbury {Bloodstock Stud }was founded in l967. There are currently 9 brood mares with foals and 5 maiden or barren. They breed progeny to race under the Owner's colours. {Yearlings are trained for {flat racing}, proven {fillies}return to stud as {brood mares and kept until aged 15 to 20, foaling every year. To prevent the spread of {Contagious Equine Metritis} the mares actually foal away at the stud where the stallion who will cover them next is standing. Swab tests for clearance are taken before leaving Cornbury, after foaling and before covering. They go to well-known {stallions} and are covered during the foaling heat or the next 5 wks later. 50ha of{pad- {docks} at Cornbury provide {grazing {and hay. Bran and home-grown oats} fed too. There is {stabling} for {40}. The Stud employs {4 full time staff}.
